description: Everyone over 75 on the Isle of Man will receive a free licence, whatever their circumstances.
title: Isle of Man treasury to fund TV licences for over-75s in 2021
title_page: Isle of Man treasury to fund TV licences for over-75s in 2021 - BBC News
maintext: Mr Cannan said the BBC's decision had come "at quite a late point in the year" and government funding was being put in place to "provide clarity" for the year ahead.
